price: Wọ́n wí pé: “A ò níí yé dúró sọ́dọ̀ rẹ̀ tí a óò máa jọ́sìn fún un títí (Ànábì) Mūsā yóò fi padà sọ́dọ̀ wa.”
arabic: قَالُواْ لَن نَّبۡرَحَ عَلَيۡهِ عَٰكِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرۡجِعَ إِلَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū lan nabraḥa ʿalayhi ʿākifīna ḥattā yarjiʿa ilaynā mūsā
